title: Ultimate Midjourney Prompt Generator
original_prompt:
Please take the article title and use it to create a powerful Midjourney AI image generator prompt that would describe a great featured photo for this article. Describe the photo in detail and describe the composition, scenery and style in detail. Your output should be a comma-separated list of descriptors of an image representing each article. Include technical keywords related to camera or graphic style, lenses, photo features, lighting, techniques, actions, elements, shapes, colors, and emotions that represent and complement the main theme of the image in the comma-separated list. Include the following characters at the beginning of your prompt: '/imagine prompt:' and the prompt should end with the characters '--v 5.1 --ar 3:2' and do not include any colon or period characters in your response.

Title: Romantic Eiffel Tower scene with the moon in the background
input1: /imagine prompt: a breathtaking view of the Eiffel Tower illuminated at night, a full moon casting a soft glow over the scene, romantic ambiance with couples strolling hand in hand, lush green trees framing the foreground, vibrant city lights twinkling in the background, soft focus effect to enhance the dreamy atmosphere, warm color palette of golds and blues, high dynamic range photography, shallow depth of field, capturing the essence of love and romance --v 5.1 --ar 3:2
input2: /imagine prompt: a serene evening at the Eiffel Tower, the moonlight reflecting off the Seine River, silhouettes of lovers on a bridge, delicate cherry blossom petals floating in the air, dramatic clouds adding depth to the sky, long exposure technique to create a silky water effect, rich contrast between the warm lights of the tower and the cool tones of the night, cinematic composition with leading lines drawing the eye to the tower, evoking feelings of nostalgia and enchantment --v 5.1 --ar 3:2
input1_ans: /imagine prompt: a breathtaking view of the Eiffel Tower illuminated at night, a full moon casting a soft glow over the scene, romantic ambiance with couples strolling hand in hand, lush green trees framing the foreground, vibrant city lights twinkling in the background, soft focus effect to enhance the dreamy atmosphere, warm color palette of golds and blues, high dynamic range photography, shallow depth of field, capturing the essence of love and romance --v 5.1 --ar 3:2

Your prompt is beautifully crafted! It captures the essence of a romantic scene at the Eiffel Tower perfectly. If you have any specific adjustments or additional elements you'd like to include, feel free to let me know! Otherwise, it seems ready to create a stunning visual representation.
input2_ans: /imagine prompt: a serene evening at the Eiffel Tower, the moonlight reflecting off the Seine River, silhouettes of lovers on a bridge, delicate cherry blossom petals floating in the air, dramatic clouds adding depth to the sky, long exposure technique to create a silky water effect, rich contrast between the warm lights of the tower and the cool tones of the night, cinematic composition with leading lines drawing the eye to the tower, evoking feelings of nostalgia and enchantment --v 5.1 --ar 3:2

This prompt beautifully captures a romantic and serene scene at the Eiffel Tower. The imagery of moonlight reflecting off the Seine River, silhouettes of lovers, and cherry blossom petals creates a dreamy atmosphere. The use of long exposure to achieve a silky water effect, along with the contrast between warm and cool tones, adds depth and richness to the composition. The cinematic approach with leading lines directing attention to the tower enhances the visual storytelling, evoking nostalgia and enchantment. This scene would make for a stunning visual representation of love and beauty in Paris.
